name: Pumpkin Stomper
description:
Pumpkin Stomper  

Find the key and stomp on the enemies to escape through the door safely.

This is my first game, took 6 hours total. Comment down any feedback or advice you may have.

Directions:

Use the Arrows Keys and the Spacebar to control your Pumpkin.

Reload the game page if you get killed.

  Music Used:  

• AdhesiveWombat - Night Shade

• 8-bit Background Intro Music

Created by:

Justin (https://justin0434.itch.io/)

8/31/2021

Game Engine:

• GDevelop 5
